brief: AudioIn lets you grab the audio input from your sound card.

methods.name: amp()
methods.desc: Change the amplitude/volume of this sound.

methods.name: pan()
methods.desc: Move the sound in a stereo panorama.

methods.name: play()
methods.desc: Start capturing the input stream and route it to the audio output

methods.name: set()
methods.desc: Set amplitude and pan position with one method.

methods.name: start()
methods.desc: Start the input stream without routing it to the audio output.

methods.name: stop()
methods.desc: Stop capturing sound from this audio input.

description: AudioIn lets you grab the audio input from your sound card.
name: AudioIn
